<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get Related Data</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(request, response) {
    var number = request.queryParams.number;

    // Trigger the flow
    var flowInputs = { number: number };
    var flowName = 'Get Related List Data'; // Use your actual flow name

    var flowAPI = new sn_fd.FlowAPI();
    var result = flowAPI.startFlow(flowName, flowInputs);

    // Wait for flow to complete (optional: use async if needed)
    var output = result.getOutputs();
    response.setBody(output.relatedData);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_cpszo_spoke/relatedlistapi/get_related_data</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_related_data</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-05 04:54:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>abd515ed87f72290b3fb021a0cbb3561</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Related Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Spoke" source="x_cpszo_spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_abd515ed87f72290b3fb021a0cbb3561</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-05 05:05:16</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="RelatedListAPI">cfa55dad87f72290b3fb021a0cbb35a1</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
